short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly jump to the recipe on any food blog with a single click. No more scrolling through endless content!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Frustrated by endlessly scrolling through recipe pages just to find the instructions? Say goodbye to that hassle. This extension cuts straight to the recipe so you can get cooking faster.

Simply install it, Don't forget to pin it ! 
Then click the extension icon, and you'll be taken directly to the instructions.

Enjoy and happy cooking! ðŸ˜Š
